name: RS Coming Soon
author: Noor-E-Alam

sections.description:
RS Coming Soon plugin has super admin panel where your customize anything including fonts and translate to any language and control saved emails from visitor and export to csv formate even you can remove emails from admin panel. Its fully SEO optimized under construction plugin

See live demo here: http://themebon.com/rs-coming-soon/

Features

  • Super easy installation.
  • Works with any theme.
  • Fully Responsive.
  • Fully Customizable.
  • Amazing cloud effects.
  • Seo friendly.
  • Powerful security.
  • Form validation.
  • Show success message after submit.
  • Store emails in database.
  • Show emails in dashboard.
  • Remove emails from dashboard.
  • All major browser supported.
  • and many more.
sections.installation:
Installing this plugin as regular wordpress plugin.

After install and activate, you will see on top to Redux Framrwork plugin required, install redux plugin as well. After that you can see a dashboard menu in bottom called RS Coming Soon & RS Subscriber. In RS Coming Soon you can customize all things and in RS Subscriber you can control your visitors emails.

short_description: RS Coming Soon plugin Creates a page for your Website while it's under construction and collects emails from your visitors and show in dashboard.
